translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The reverse order of the law of conditionality

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽22.29. Sanidassanattika, Cūḷantaraduka🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasappaccayo dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā upanissaye tīṇi.🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho sanidassano🔽dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.🔽Naanidassanaappaṭigho nanasanidassano dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa nasanidassanassa
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sani dassana ttika cūḍantara duka  na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na sappaccayaḥ dhammaḥ anidassana appaṭighassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitte ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā upanissaye tīṇi  na sanidassana sappaṭigham na sanidassanam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ sa nidassanaḥ  dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca adhipatiyā pañca pe avigate pañca  na a nidassana appaṭighaḥ na na sa nidassanaḥ dhammaḥ anidassana appaṭighassa na sa nidassanassa
translated: The section of the triplets and couplets in the method of the forward order

original: paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)

original: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekavīsa adhipatiyā ekavīsa pe avigate ekavīsa
translated: … a mundane object that is not to be directly known …🔽… a mundane object that is to be directly known …🔽… a supramundane object that is not to be directly known …🔽… a mundane object that is to be directly known …🔽… a mundane object that is not to be fully understood …

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nalokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
